df-ufil
blocks.content: Define the set of ultrafilters on a set. An ultrafilter is a filter that gives a definite result for every subset. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 30-Nov-2009.)

blocks.name: df-ufl
blocks.content: Define the class of base sets for which the ultrafilter lemma ~ filssufil holds. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: isufil
blocks.content: The property of being an ultrafilter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 30-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  elmptrab2(hs1, hs0, c0, cufil, c1, cfv(cfil, c1), cfv(cfil, cv(hs1)), cdm(cfil), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs1)), wo(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  df-ufil(hs1, hs0, s0)
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wo(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1)))
  pweq(cv(hs1), c1)
  orbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  sylan(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wceq(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cdif(c1, cv(s0))))
  difeq1(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s0))
  eleq12(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0), c0)
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cfil)
  fvex(cfil, cv(hs1))
  elfvdm(c0, cfil, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfil, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(cfil))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfil, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfil, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cfil))
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm isufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)â†”(c0 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ s0)âˆˆ c0))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  elmptrab2(hs1, hs0, c0, cufil, c1, (Fil ` c1), (Fil ` hs1), dom(Fil), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ s0)âˆˆ c0)), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(hs1),(s0 âˆˆ hs0 âˆ¨(hs1 \ s0)âˆˆ hs0)))
  df-ufil(hs1, hs0, s0)
  raleqbidv(s0, P(hs1), P(c1), (hs1 = c1 âˆ§ hs0 = c0), (s0 âˆˆ hs0 âˆ¨(hs1 \ s0)âˆˆ hs0), (s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ s0)âˆˆ c0))
  adantr(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0, P(hs1)= P(c1))
  pweq(hs1, c1)
  orbi12d((hs1 = c1 âˆ§ hs0 = c0), s0 âˆˆ hs0, (hs1 \ s0)âˆˆ hs0, s0 âˆˆ c0, (c1 \ s0)âˆˆ c0)
  adantl(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0, (s0 âˆˆ hs0 â†” s0 âˆˆ c0))
  eleq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  sylan(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0, ((hs1 \ s0)âˆˆ hs0 â†”(c1 \ s0)âˆˆ c0), (hs1 \ s0)=(c1 \ s0))
  difeq1(hs1, c1, s0)
  eleq12((hs1 \ s0), (c1 \ s0), hs0, c0)
  fveq2(hs1, c1, cfil)
  fvex(cfil, hs1)
  elfvdm(c0, cfil, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Fil ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(Fil))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Fil ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((Fil ` hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(dom(Fil))
  diff.hs1.w(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ s0)âˆˆ c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ s0)âˆˆ c0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ufilfil
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is a filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: ufilss
blocks.content: For any subset of the base set of an ultrafilter, either the set is in the ultrafilter or the complement is. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufilss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
  sylbird(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)), wcel(c2, cpw(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(cufil)))
  elfvdm(c0, cufil, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, cdm(cufil), c2)
  simplbiim(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  isufil(hs0, c0, c1)
  rspccv(hs0, cpw(c1), c2, wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  eleq1d(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0, cdif(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  difeq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
}

thm ufilss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âŠ† c1)â†’(c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ c2)âˆˆ c0))
} = {
  imp(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âŠ† c1, (c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ c2)âˆˆ c0))
  sylbird(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âŠ† c1, (c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ c2)âˆˆ c0), c2 âˆˆ P(c1))
  syl(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), (c2 âˆˆ P(c1)â†” c2 âŠ† c1), c1 âˆˆ dom(UFil))
  elfvdm(c0, cufil, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, dom(UFil), c2)
  simplbiim(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), (c2 âˆˆ P(c1)â†’(c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ c2)âˆˆ c0)), c0 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c1),(hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ hs0)âˆˆ c0)))
  isufil(hs0, c0, c1)
  rspccv(hs0, P(c1), c2, (hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ hs0)âˆˆ c0), (c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ c2)âˆˆ c0))
  orbi12d(hs0 = c2, hs0 âˆˆ c0, (c1 \ hs0)âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ c0, (c1 \ c2)âˆˆ c0)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, c0)
  eleq1d((c1 \ hs0), c0, (c1 \ c2), hs0 = c2)
  difeq2(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ¨(c1 \ c2)âˆˆ c0))
}

blocks.name: ufilb
blocks.content: The complement is in an ultrafilter iff the set is not. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufilb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wn(wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wn(wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))
  ord(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))
  ufilss(c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wn(wcel(c2, c0))))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wn(wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  con2d(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
  fbncp(c0, c1, c2, c1)
}

  ufilfil(c0, c1)

blocks.name: ufilmax
blocks.content: Any filter finer than an ultrafilter is actually equal to it. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufilmax(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c2))
} = {
  eqssd(c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
  ssrdv(hs0, c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
  mpdd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ex(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  filelss(c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  com23(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  con4d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sylbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))
  3ad2antl1(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  ufilb(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  syld(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2))
  sseld(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0, c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  con2d(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  filfbas(c2, c1)
  ex(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  fbncp(c2, c1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
}

thm ufilmax(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 âŠ† c2)â†’ c0 = c2)
} = {
  eqssd(c0, c2, (c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 âŠ† c2))
  simp3(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), c0 âŠ† c2)
  ssrdv(hs0, c2, c0, (c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 âŠ† c2))

  3ad2ant2(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), c0 âŠ† c2, (hs0 âˆˆ c2 â†’ hs0 âŠ† c1))
  ex(c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), hs0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âŠ† c1)
  filelss(c2, c1, hs0)
  com23((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 âŠ† c2), hs0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âŠ† c1, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  ex((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 âŠ† c2), hs0 âŠ† c1, (hs0 âˆˆ c2 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0))
  con4d(((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 âŠ† c2)âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c1), hs0 âˆˆ c2, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  sylbid(((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 âŠ† c2)âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c1), Â¬ hs0 âˆˆ c0, Â¬ hs0 âˆˆ c2, (c1 \ hs0)âˆˆ c0)
  3ad2antl1(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), c0 âŠ† c2, hs0 âŠ† c1, (Â¬ hs0 âˆˆ c0 â†”(c1 \ hs0)âˆˆ c0))

blocks.name: ufprim
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is a prime filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufprim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0)))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0))

  elpwi(cv(hs0), c2)

blocks.content: A filter is contained in some ultrafilter. This version of ~ filssufil contains the choice as a hypothesis (in the assumption that ` ~P ~P X ` is well-orderable). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

blocks.content: A filter is contained in some ultrafilter. (Requires the Axiom of Choice, via ~ numth3 .) (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 2-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: isufl
blocks.content: Define the (strong) ultrafilter lemma, parameterized over base sets. A set ` X ` satisfies the ultrafilter lemma if every filter on ` X ` is a subset of some ultrafilter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isufl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cufl), wral(s0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cufl, wral(s0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, cfv(cfil, cv(hs0)), wrex(s1, cfv(cufil, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cfv(cfil, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfil, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cufil, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wrex(s1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cfil)
  rexeqdv(s1, cfv(cufil, cv(hs0)), cfv(cufil, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cufil)
  df-ufl(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cufil, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cufil, c0)
  diff.cufil.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ufli
blocks.content: Property of a set that satisfies the ultrafilter lemma. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufli(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c0))), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cufl), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c0)), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cufl), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  isufl(hs0, s0, c0, cufl)
  rspccva(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), c1, wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  rexbidv(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfil, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm ufli(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ UFL âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ(Fil ` c0))â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c0), c1 âŠ† s0))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
} = {

  rexbidv(s0, (UFil ` c0), hs0 = c1, hs0 âŠ† s0, c1 âŠ† s0)
  sseq1(hs0, c1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Fil ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c0), c1 âŠ† s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: numufl
blocks.content: Consequence of ~ filssufilg : a set whose double powerset is well-orderable satisfies the ultrafilter lemma. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm numufl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c0, cufl))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c0, cufl), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  ancoms(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c0)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  filssufilg(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wb(wcel(c0, cufl), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  sylibr(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  pwexr(cpw(c0), cdm(ccrd))
  pwexb(c0)
  isufl(hs0, hs1, c0, universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: fiufl

blocks.name: acufl

thm acufl() {

  pwex(cv(hs0))

  diff.hs0.c(cufl)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wac)
}

  fgcl(cv(hs0), c0)
  ufli(hs2, c0, co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, c1), cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), crest, c1)))

  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))), wb(wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, c1), cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c1, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(c1, c0))

  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), crest, c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)))
  ad2antlr(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2))), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)))

  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)))

thm ssufl(class c0, class c1) {

blocks.name: ufileu
blocks.content: If the ultrafilter containing a given filter is unique, the filter is an ultrafilter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: filufint
blocks.content: A filter is equal to the intersection of the ultrafilters containing it. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqssd(cint(crab(s0, cfv(cufil, c1), wss(c0, cv(s0)))), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))

blocks.name: uffix
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ fixufil and ~ uffixfr . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffix(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wceq(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wceq(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2)))))
  eqrdv(hs0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  anbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0)))
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  sylancr(wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(csn(c2), csn(csn(c2))), wss(csn(c2), cv(hs0)))
  snid(csn(c2))
  snssi(c2, cv(hs0))
  rspcev(s0, csn(c2), csn(csn(c2)), wss(csn(c2), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sseq1(cv(s0), csn(c2), cv(hs0))
  rexlimdva(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))
  sylan9r(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(csn(c2))), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(hs0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), csn(csn(c2))), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(hs0))), wss(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(s0)))
  intss1(cv(s0), csn(csn(c2)))
  sstr2(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  syl5com(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cint(csn(csn(c2)))))
  syl6eleqr(c2, cint(csn(csn(c2))), csn(c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, csn(c2)))
  snidg(c2, c0)
  intsn(csn(c2))
  snex(c2)
  ssel(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(hs0), c2)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  elrab(s0, cv(hs0), cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))
  eleq2w(s0, hs0, c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2)))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  syl2an23an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wss(csn(c2), c0), wne(csn(c2), emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))
  snssi(c2, c0)
  snnzg(c2, c0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0))
  snfbas(csn(c2), c0, c1)
  elfg(s0, csn(csn(c2)), c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, csn(c2))
  diff.wss.s(s0, csn(c2), cv(hs0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
}

thm uffix(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c0)â†’({ { c2 } } âˆˆ(fBas ` c0)âˆ§ { s0 âˆˆ P(c0)| c2 âˆˆ s0 } =(c0[filGen]{ { c2 } })))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  jca((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c0), { { c2 } } âˆˆ(fBas ` c0), { s0 âˆˆ P(c0)| c2 âˆˆ s0 } =(c0[filGen]{ { c2 } }))

  anbi12d((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c0), hs0 âˆˆ P(c0), c2 âˆˆ hs0, hs0 âŠ† c0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ { { c2 } }, s0 âŠ† hs0))

  snid({ c2 })
  snssi(c2, hs0)
  rspcev(s0, { c2 }, { { c2 } }, { c2 } âŠ† hs0, s0 âŠ† hs0)

  syl(s0 âˆˆ { { c2 } }, (s0 âŠ† hs0 â†’ â‹‚ { { c2 } } âŠ† hs0), â‹‚ { { c2 } } âŠ† s0)
  intss1(s0, { { c2 } })
  sstr2(â‹‚ { { c2 } }, s0, hs0)
  syl5com((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c0), â‹‚ { { c2 } } âŠ† hs0, c2 âˆˆ hs0, c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ { { c2 } })
  syl6eleqr(c2, â‹‚ { { c2 } }, { c2 }, (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c0))

blocks.name: fixufil
blocks.content: The condition describing a fixed ultrafilter always produces an ultrafilter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 9-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fixufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cufil, c0)))

blocks.name: uffixfr
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is either fixed or free. A fixed ultrafilter is called principal (generated by a single element ` A ` ), and a free ultrafilter is called nonprincipal (having empty intersection). Note that examples of free ultrafilters cannot be defined in ZFC without some form of global choice. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

} = {

  syl3anc((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0), c0 = { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 }, c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 } âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), c0 âŠ† { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 })
  simpl(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0)
  eqeltrd({ s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 }, (Fil ` c1), (c1[filGen]{ { c2 } }), (c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0))
  simprd((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0), { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 } =(c1[filGen]{ { c2 } }), { { c2 } } âˆˆ(fBas ` c1))
  syl((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0), (c1[filGen]{ { c2 } })âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), { { c2 } } âˆˆ(fBas ` c1))
  simpld((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0), { { c2 } } âˆˆ(fBas ` c1), { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 } =(c1[filGen]{ { c2 } }))
  syl2an2r(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0, ({ { c2 } } âˆˆ(fBas ` c1)âˆ§ { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 } =(c1[filGen]{ { c2 } })), c1 âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ c1)
  sselda(c2, â‹‚ c0, c1, c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1))
  sseqtrd(â‹‚ c0, c1, â‹ƒ c0, c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1))
  3syl(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), â‹‚ c0 âŠ† â‹ƒ c0, c0 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), c0 â‰  âˆ…)
  filn0(c0, c1)

  ibi(c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ s0))
  elintg(s0, c2, â‹‚ c0, c0)

  mpbird((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 = { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 }), c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ s0))

  3syl((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c0 = { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 }), (c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0 â†” âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ s0)), c1 âˆˆ { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 }, c2 âˆˆ c1)

  filtop(c0, c1)

  eleq2(c0, { s0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ s0 }, c1)

blocks.name: uffix2
blocks.content: A classification of fixed ultrafilters. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffix2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wb(wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  exbidv(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0))))
  pm4.71rd(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  sseld(cv(s0), cint(c0), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  sseqtrd(cint(c0), c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cint(c0), cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  filn0(c0, c1)
  intssuni(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  anbi2d(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0)), wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  uffixfr(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  n0(s0, cint(c0))
  df-rex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cufil, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cint.s(s0, c0)
}

  pm4.71rd(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), s0 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0, s0 âˆˆ c1)
  sseld(s0, â‹‚ c0, c1, c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1))

  3syl(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), â‹‚ c0 âŠ† â‹ƒ c0, c0 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), c0 â‰  âˆ…)
  filn0(c0, c1)
  intssuni(c0)
  syl(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), â‹ƒ c0 = c1, c0 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  anbi2d(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), s0 âˆˆ c1, s0 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0, c0 = { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| s0 âˆˆ s1 })
  uffixfr(s1, c0, c1, s0)

blocks.name: uffixsn
blocks.content: The singleton of the generator of a fixed ultrafilter is in the filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffixsn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))), wcel(csn(c2), c0))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(csn(c2), c0, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wcel(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))))
  elrabd(hs0, csn(c2), cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, csn(c2)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), csn(c2), c2)
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))), wcel(csn(c2), cpw(c1)), wss(csn(c2), c1))
  snssd(c2, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))))
  sselda(c2, cint(c0), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  sseqtrd(cint(c0), c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cint(c0), cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  filn0(c0, c1)
  intssuni(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  elpw(csn(c2), c1)
  snex(c2)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0)), wcel(c2, csn(c2)))
  snidg(c2, cint(c0))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0)), wceq(c0, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  uffixfr(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c2, csn(c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm uffixsn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0)â†’ { c2 } âˆˆ c0)
} = {
  eleqtrrd({ c2 }, c0, { hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)| c2 âˆˆ hs0 }, (c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0))
  elrabd(hs0, { c2 }, P(c1), (c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0), c2 âˆˆ hs0, c2 âˆˆ { c2 })
  eleq2(hs0, { c2 }, c2)
  sylibr((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0), { c2 } âˆˆ P(c1), { c2 } âŠ† c1)
  snssd(c2, c1, (c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0))
  sselda(c2, â‹‚ c0, c1, c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1))
  sseqtrd(â‹‚ c0, c1, â‹ƒ c0, c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1))
  3syl(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), â‹‚ c0 âŠ† â‹ƒ c0, c0 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1), c0 â‰  âˆ…)
  filn0(c0, c1)
  intssuni(c0)
  syl(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), â‹ƒ c0 = c1, c0 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1))

  uffixfr(hs0, c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: ufildom1
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is generated by at most one element (because free ultrafilters have no generators and fixed ultrafilters have exactly one). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufildom1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wbr(cint(c0), cdom, c1o))
} = {
  pm2.61ne(cint(c0), emptycls, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wbr(cint(c0), cdom, c1o), wbr(emptycls, cdom, c1o))
  breq1(cint(c0), emptycls, cdom, c1o)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls)), wbr(cint(c0), cdom, c1o), wbr(cint(c0), cen, c1o))
  imp(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wbr(cint(c0), cen, c1o))
  3imtr4g(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wbr(cint(c0), cen, c1o), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wex(hs0, wceq(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  eximdv(hs0, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wceq(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wceq(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqssd(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wss(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  uffixsn(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  intss1(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)
  snssd(cv(hs0), cint(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)))
  n0(hs0, cint(c0))
  en1(hs0, cint(c0))
  endom(cint(c0), c1o)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wbr(emptycls, cdom, c1o), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  0domg(c1o, con0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(c0))
}

blocks.name: uffinfix
blocks.content: An ultrafilter containing a finite element is fixed. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffinfix(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wne(cint(c0), emptycls))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filfinnfr(c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn), wb(wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  uffix2(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uffinfix(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ Fin)â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c0 = { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| s0 âˆˆ s1 }))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ Fin), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c0 = { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| s0 âˆˆ s1 }), â‹‚ c0 â‰  âˆ…)
  syl3an1(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ Fin, â‹‚ c0 â‰  âˆ…, c0 âˆˆ(Fil ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filfinnfr(c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1), c2 âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ Fin, (â‹‚ c0 â‰  âˆ… â†” âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c0 = { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| s0 âˆˆ s1 })))
  uffix2(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: cfinufil
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is free iff it contains the Fréchet filter ~ cfinfil as a subset. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jul-2008.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfinufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wb(wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wss(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn)), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wss(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn)), c0), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  impbid(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ralrimdva(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wi(wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  elpwi(cv(s0), c1)
  com23(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wi(wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  necon4bd(cint(c0), emptycls, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wb(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)))
  ufilb(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wne(cint(c0), emptycls)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wne(cint(c0), emptycls))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  com23(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wne(cint(c0), emptycls))
  3exp(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wne(cint(c0), emptycls))
  filfinnfr(c0, c1, cdif(c1, cv(s0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls))
  eq0rdv(hs0, cint(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  pm2.01d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)))
  impancom(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  syld(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  mpid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn))
  syl6eqel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn, csn(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wceq(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), csn(cv(hs0))), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1))
  dfss4(csn(cv(hs0)), c1)
  snfi(cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wi(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1)))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1)), wss(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c1))
  difss(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wb(wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1)), wss(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  filtop(c0, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, c0, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))
  rspcv(s0, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  eleq1d(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  difeq2(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c1)
  eleq1(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wb(wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filelss(c0, c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  ufilb(c0, c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  pm2.24d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  uffixsn(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  rabss(s0, cpw(c1), c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cufil, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cint(c0), emptycls)
  diff.cint.s(s0, c0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cint(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  filfinnfr(c0, c1, (c1 \ s0))

  eq0rdv(hs0, â‹‚ c0, (c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c1 \ s0)âˆˆ Fin â†’ s0 âˆˆ c0))))
  pm2.01d((c0 âˆˆ(UFil ` c1)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c1 \ s0)âˆˆ Fin â†’ s0 âˆˆ c0))), hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ c0)

blocks.name: ufilen
blocks.content: Any infinite set has an ultrafilter on it whose elements are of the same cardinality as the set. Any such ultrafilter is necessarily free. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufilen(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c0))), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0))))
  syl(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0))), wcel(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cfv(cfil, c0)))
  mpancom(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cfv(cfil, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
  syl(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex2i(com, cdom, c0)
  reldom()
  numth3(c0, universe)
  csdfil(hs0, c0)
  filssufil(s0, crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), c0)
  reximdva(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c0)))
  ralrimdva(s1, cv(s0), wa(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0))), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c0))
  sylsyld(wa(wa(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c0), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, c0), wn(wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0)))
  sylc(wa(wa(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, c0), wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0))
  ssdomg(c0, universe, cv(s1))
  syl21anc(wa(wa(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wi(wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wn(wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  ad2antlr(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elfvex(cv(s0), cufil, c0)
  adantll(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s1), c0))
  sylan(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfil, c0)))
  filelss(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  sylan(wa(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  adantl(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfil, c0)))
  ufilfil(cv(s0), c0)
  filfbas(cv(s0), c0)
  fbncp(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), c0)
  impancom(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0)))
  con3d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0))), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0))
  impancom(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0), wi(wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0)), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  syl5com(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0)), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0)), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0))))
  elrabd(hs0, cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cpw(c0), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0)), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cdif(c0, cv(s1))), csdm, c0))
  breq1d(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0, cdif(c0, cdif(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, cv(s1))))
  difeq2(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, cv(s1)), c0)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cpw(c0)))
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cpw(c0)), wss(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), c0))
  difss(c0, cv(s1))
  elpw2g(c0, universe, cdif(c0, cv(s1)))
  eqbrtrd(cdif(c0, cdif(c0, cv(s1))), csdm, c0, cv(s1), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0)))
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0)), wceq(cdif(c0, cdif(c0, cv(s1))), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0))
  dfss4(cv(s1), c0)
  simp3(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0))
  ssel(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(s1)))
  simplbi2(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, c0), wn(wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c0))
  bren2(cv(s1), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.csdm.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, com, cdom, c0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.cdom.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, com, cdom, c0)
  diff.com.s(s1)
  diff.cdom.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cufil, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cufil, c0)
  diff.cufil.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), cv(s0))
  diff.crab.s(s1, hs0, cpw(c0), wbr(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.csdm.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, cv(s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cdif(c0, cdif(c0, cv(s1))), csdm, c0))
}

blocks.name: ufildr
blocks.content: An ultrafilter gives rise to a connected door topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufildr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cun(c2, cfv(ccld, c2)), cpw(c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cun(c2, cfv(ccld, c2)), cpw(c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c2, cfv(ccld, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2))), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  impbid(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2))), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  jaod(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  elssuni(cv(hs0), c2)
  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  cldss(cv(hs0), c2, cuni(c2))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2))))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  ufilss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  orim12d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)))
  sseld(cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2))
  sseld(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(c0, c2))
  sseqtr4i(c0, c2, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  ssun1(c0, csn(emptycls))

blocks.name: fin1aufil
blocks.content: There are no definable free ultrafilters in ZFC. However, there are free ultrafilters in some choice-denying constructions. Here we show that given an amorphous set (a.k.a. a Ia-finite I-infinite set) ` X ` , the set of infinite subsets of ` X ` is a free ultrafilter on ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2015.)
